game.name: A Night Filled With the Sound of Rain
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A rainy night brings you to a small bar. When you step inside, you're met with soothing music. Your eyes land on a beautiful woman by the counter. Get to know Michiru and share your story with her. This unforgettable evening will be etched into your memory forever.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A rainy night brings you to a small bar. When you step inside, you're met with soothing music. Your eyes land on a beautiful woman by the counter. Get to know Michiru and share your story with her. This unforgettable evening will be etched into your memory forever.

reviewHighlights.text: 아니 이거 감성힐링게임이 아니었네...... 까고보니 야겜이라 좀 당황함. 야겜으로서는 살짝 아쉬운 것 같긴 한데, 그래도 감성과 분위기는 좋아서 그냥 새벽감성에 짧게 즐기기에는 나쁘지 않은 것 같음. 다만 배급사 홈페이지에서 패치를 받지 않으면 스토리가 굉장히 뜬금없...
